Class FoodStorage

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idi.idatt.storage.FoodStorage
public class FoodStorage extends Object
The FoodStorage class manages a collection of items, allowing operations such as....

p> Name, getName, as key, and Item object as the value.
